description:
Fruit Math is the classic game in which there is a table with fruits and numbers, and the player must deduct what is the value for each fruit. All fruits will have a different value from 1 to 10.

**** UPDATE ****
New version released. Read your comments (thanks!) and made the changes that you requested:

- If there are multiple solutions, all of them will be valid and not only the one that generated the puzzle.

- Added instructions in the application.

- Fixed the bug in the game count.

- Smoother transitions between views (no more blink/flash when going from one place to another).

-------------------------
This game is still in beta mode. Please inform me of any glitches/bugs you find so I can fix them.
